alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy showers and a few thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire and eastern Franklin Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers and a few thunderstorms extending from near Northfield southward to Belchertown. Movement was slowly east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Orange, Belchertown, Athol, Ware, Montague, Barre, North Brookfield, West Brookfield, Northfield, Hardwick, Bernardston, Oakham, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury, Phillipston, Gill, Pelham, Royalston and Petersham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester
